actions.name: create_record
actions.description: Create a new record in a specified Insightly object (Contact, Lead, Opportunity, etc.)

actions.name: delete_record
actions.description: Delete a record by ID from a specified Insightly object

actions.name: find_records
actions.description: Find records in a specified Insightly object

actions.name: get_record
actions.description: Get a record by ID from a specified Insightly object

actions.name: update_record
actions.description: Your Insightly pod (e.g., "na1", "eu1"). Find this in your API URL: https://api.{pod}.insightly.com

triggers.name: deleted_record
triggers.description: Fires when a record is deleted from Insightly

triggers.name: new_record
triggers.description: Fires when a new record is created in Insightly (requires webhook setup)

triggers.name: updated_record
triggers.description: Fires when an existing record is updated in Insightly (requires webhook setup)
